update.description:
ign-math is already using c++14:

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/0cac2ad588f7db914f353a9a88a939977cd7181c/CMakeLists.txt?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#CMakeLists.txt-17

but this has been using c++11 apparently, which causes a compiler warning:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_common-ci-default-bionic-amd64&build=9)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-default-bionic-amd64/9/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-default-bionic-amd64/9/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_common-ci-default-homebrew-amd64&build=115)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/115/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/115/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_common-ci-default-xenial-amd64&build=82)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-default-xenial-amd64/82/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-default-xenial-amd64/82/

this should fix several of these builds
update.title: use cxx14 in default branch to fix compiler warning
